source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_00<tab>Oboro is wearing a shite-eating grin on his face for reasons you can only begin to imagine.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_00<tab>Vous lisez un petit sourire heureux sur le visage d'Oboro.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_01<tab>You reunite with Oboro, who cheerfully proclaims that he has at long last devised a plan to get the better of his longtime rival, Karasu Redbeak, and recover the half of the forbidden mudra scroll currently in the flamboyant ninja's possession. Splitting up so as not to attract attention, you make for the Hermit's Hovel─a bathhouse where Karasu has recently taken up residence─where Oboro means to elaborate on the details of his plan.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_01<tab>Oboro a découvert la cachette de Karasu et il a mis au point un plan pour lui reprendre le parchemin qu'il avait dérobé lors de votre dernière rencontre. Votre par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>tion étant requise, il vous a donné rendez-vous à L'Ascension pour vous donner plus de détails.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_02<tab>Upon your arrival, Oboro eagerly explains how he intends to thwart his rival. Oboro intends to distract Karasu in the midst of his daily bathing ritual, allowing you to sneak into the bathhouse and make off with the scroll─a strategy not unlike the one you employed on a previous adventure back in Kugane. Wait in the shadows at Oboro's instruction, and be prepared to make your move when Karasu has been lured away from the scene.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_02<tab>Oboro vous a expliqué son plan. Pendant qu'il proposera à Karasu de se réconcilier autour de quelques coupes de saké, vous allez vous emparer du parchemin. Rendez-vous à la masure de l'ermite, dans la Noscea extérieure, et attendez à l'endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_03<tab>Oboro's ruse is a great success, as Karasu is all too willing to join him in a leisurely chat over some Hingan rice wine, leaving the bathhouse entirely unattended. Infiltrate the structure and sort through Karasu's belongings in search of the scroll before the wily ninja wises up to the situation and returns.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_03<tab>Oboro a réussi à gagner la confiance de Karasu, et les deux ninja sont maintenant pris dans une discussion passionnée et bien arrosée. C'est à vous de jouer<var 1D /var>: inspectez l'intérieur de la masure de l'ermite pour trouver le parchemin de Karasu.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_04<tab>You succeed in finding the scroll alongside other considerably less helpful documents also scattered throughout the hovel. Make a discreet retreat and return to the Long Climb that you might rendezvous with Oboro and ascertain that what you found is indeed the authentic item.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez trouvé où Karasu cachait son parchemin. Il est temps d'aller retrouver Oboro à l'endroit convenu pour lui remettre le précieux document. Retournez à L'Ascension et attendez à l'endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_05<tab>Oboro rejoices upon seeing the scroll in your possession and declares the entire operation an unqualified triumph. He invites you to return to the dock storehouse that you might discuss matters further in private, and goes off on his way.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez remis le parchemin à Oboro, qui était ravi que son plan se soit déroulé sans accroc. Mais il vaut mieux déguerpir avant que Karasu ne se rende compte de la supercherie... Retournez à l'entrepôt du quai et parlez à Oboro.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_06<tab>As Oboro revels in his triumph over his bitter rival, the two of you are joined by your mutual friend Captain Jacke of the Dutiful Sisters. Heartened by the unexpected reunion, the jovial rogue invites the both of you for celebratory dinner and drinks at the Bismarck, an offer which Oboro accepts gladly. Make your way to Limsa Lominsa, where you might share a fine feast with your companions.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_06<tab>Alors qu'Oboro était en train de se féliciter de son succès, Jacke vous a rendu visite pour vous inviter à manger ensemble. Rendez-vous à Limsa Lominsa et attendez à l'endroit indiqué, au Bismarck.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_07<tab>At the Bismarck, your revelry is interrupted when Oboro rushes into the establishment half-naked. You and Captain Jacke quickly deduce that the “Oboro” whom you reunited with after the operation was none other than Karasu in disguise, a suspicion which is quickly confirmed when the savvy ninja reveals his true identity. The crow, victorious again over his erstwhile friend, offers a few mocking words, then turns into a bat and flaps away, leaving Oboro dejected and stark naked in the middle on the tavern floor. Jacke offers a few words of sympathy, and invites all of you back to the Sisters that you might find the poor man some clothes.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_07<tab>Alors que vous vous apprêtiez à festoyer en compagnie d'Oboro, Jacke, Perimu Haurimu et V'kebbe, un autre Oboro a fait irruption sur la terrasse du restaurant<var 1D /var>! Vous avez vite compris que Karasu avait utilisé une technique de transformation pour vous berner, mais le vil ninja s'est enfui avant que vous puissiez lui reprendre le parchemin. Rendez-vous à la guilde des surineurs et parlez à Oboro, le vrai cette fois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_08<tab>You arrive at the Sisters to find Oboro decked out in clothes from Captain Jacke's personal wardrobe, a particularly garish outfit to which the fashion-challenged ninja has inexplicably taken a liking. He fills you in on the particulars of his inglorious defeat at Karasu's hands, resolving in the end to get his revenge on his rival. After Oboro takes his leave, Captain Jacke encourages you not to be a stranger in La Noscea, as both he and your ninja friends will like as not have need of your services again.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SEQ_08<tab>Vexé de s'être encore fait rouler par son rival de toujours, Oboro s'est relancé à la poursuite de Karasu. Cet épisode fut bref, mais n'hésitez pas à rendre visite à Oboro et Jacke de temps en temps, car ils auront sûrement besoin de votre aide à nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Oboro at the Long Climb.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Oboro, à L'Ascension

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_01<tab>Keep lookout for Karasu behind the Hermit's Hovel.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_01<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_02<tab>Search inside the Hermit's Hovel and retrieve the scroll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_02<tab>Subtiliser le parchemin, dans la cabane

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_03<tab>Wait for Oboro at the Long Climb.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_03<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Oboro at the dock storehouse.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Oboro, dans l'entrepôt du quai

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_05<tab>Wait for your friends at the Bismarck.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_05<tab>Attendre à l'endroit indiqué, à Limsa Lominsa

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Oboro at the Rogues' Guild.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Oboro

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_000<tab>You thought you'd evaded me for good, did you!? We'll see who has the last laugh! Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_000<tab>Ha ha ha, enfin l'heure est arrivée...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...!? By the kami, don't sneak up on me like that! That is, of course I felt your presence. Yes, I was simply...deep in thought, that is all.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_001<tab>Hein, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!? Depuis combien de temps êtes-vous ici<var 1D /var>? Je ne vous ai même pas <var 08 E905 ((sentie)) ((senti)) /var> approcher...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_002<tab>But I daresay for good reason! For you see, I have finally tracked down that elusive bird, and am ready to seize him by the wings and take back what is mine!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_002<tab>Si je suis un peu rouillé, c'est parce que j'ai passé plus de temps à enquêter qu'à m'entraîner depuis notre dernière rencontre. Mais ça valait le coup, car figurez-vous que j'ai réussi à localiser Karasu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_100_002<tab>I speak, of course, of that blasted Karasu. Ever since he escaped with half of the forbidden scroll, I have not let up the search for a moment. Today, at long last, I have found him! Truly, this is reason to rejoice, would you not agree?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_100_002<tab>Je me suis d'ailleurs empressé d'échafauder un plan pour récupérer le parchemin d'invocation interdite qui est en sa possession, et je n'attendais plus que vous pour passer à l'action<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_003<tab>And yet, the act of stealing the scroll back will not prove so simple. Which is why your arrival is truly a gift from the heavens! You will aid me in the task, will you not? It will be just like old times!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_003<tab>Vous êtes d'accord pour m'aider, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_004<tab>Once again, I owe you my gratitude. Now, let us get down to brass tacks, as Jacke would say. My shinobi have ascertained that Karasu has once again returned to Eorzean shores to ply his trade─such as it is─in the shadows of the black markets.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_004<tab>Merci, je savais que je pouvais compter sur vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_005<tab>Furthermore, they say he has taken up residence in secret at a secluded grove in La Noscea known as the Hermit's Hovel. You know the place, yes? Let us meet up there, and I will share with you the ingenious details of my plan. I will go ahead on my own─we do not want to attract attention, after all.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_005<tab>Depuis le combat contre Hanzo, Karasu a repris ses activités de contrebande. Il s'est installé dans une petite cabane abandonnée, la “masure de l'ermite”. Retrouvons-nous à proximité pour que je vous décrive mon plan en détail.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_010<tab>I thank you for coming, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now, without further ado, let me explain precisely how I intend to recover the scroll from Karasu's clutches.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_010<tab>Ah, vous voilà<var 1D /var>! Laissez-moi vous expliquer comment nous allons procéder.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_100_010<tab>My colleagues and I have been observing the man closely for a fortnight or so. Though one would assume otherwise, he is actually a man of remarkably consistent routine.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_100_010<tab>En espionnant Karasu, j'ai découvert qu'il gardait en permanence le parchemin sur lui. La seule exception, c'est quand il se déshabille pour prendre son bain...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_011<tab>He carries the scroll in a case that never leaves his side. Save, that is, for when he goes for his daily bath─at precisely the same hour each day...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_011<tab>Il se baigne tous les jours à la même heure, juste devant la chute d'eau qui se trouve devant la cabane. Le problème, c'est qu'il ne reste jamais bien longtemps...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_012<tab>I had a mind to lift the scroll from his possessions while he was otherwise occupied─much as we did with Zakuro that one time in Kugane─but would you believe it? Almost as if by magic, no sooner has he entered the baths than he is out again, scroll at his side and fully dressed in that garish garb of his.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_012<tab>Il va donc falloir que je l'occupe pendant qu'il est dans le bain, pour vous donner le temps de fouiller la cabane. Je vous préviens tout de suite, pas de déguisement cette fois-ci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_013<tab>This is where you come in. Worry not: this will not involve any high-wire walking or elaborate disguises. I simply intend to invite the man to share a drink, and thereby delay his departure. In the meantime, you are to sneak into the bathhouse and steal away with the scroll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_013<tab>Je vais tout simplement lui proposer de nous réconcilier et lui offrir quelques coupes de saké. Pendant que nous boirons, vous devriez avoir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment de temps pour vous emparer du parchemin.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_014<tab>Ingeniously plotted, would you not say!? I need only lull Karasu into a false sense of security with my impeccable acting skills, and the scroll is as good as ours! What could go wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_014<tab>Qu'en pensez-vous<var 1D /var>? En toute objectivité, je ne vois aucune autre solution. Karasu est ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment méfiant, mais grâce à notre longue histoire commune et à mes talents de comédien, j'ai bon espoir qu'il baisse sa garde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_015<tab>So let us put the plan in action. Let us make for the hovel─separately, of course. Find yourself suitable cover, and wait for me to lure the crow away. We shall meet again here once you have safely recovered the scroll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_015<tab>Allez vous cacher derrière la cabane et attendez que Karasu se baigne pour entrer dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment à l'intérieur. Lorsque vous aurez le parchemin, nous nous retrouverons ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_018<tab>As you can see, I have everything entirely under control. Find yourself cover─Karasu should be arriving any moment.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_018<tab>Comme vous pouvez le voir, tout est prêt de mon côté. Karasu ne devrait plus tarder, donc allez vous cacher à l'endroit dont nous avons convenu, derrière la cabane.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_020<tab>Oho, but what's this!? Our hero arrives for a relaxing soak in his favorite spring, only to be stared down by his self-styled rival and realm-renowned oaf Oboro the dim! Have you not yet had your fill of being outwitted and embarrassed by your betters?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_020<tab>Ça alors, est-ce que mes yeux me jouent des tours<var 1D /var>? C'est bien toi, mon petit Oboro<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_021<tab>Spare me the bombast and bluster, Karasu. I stand before you today with an offer...an offer of peace.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_021<tab>Sois tranquille, Karasu, je viens en paix. Il est grand temps de nous réconcilier, tu ne crois pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_022<tab>We are countrymen, and there was once a time when we called each other friend. Has our conflict not persisted long enough?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_022<tab>Si j'ai choisi cette source pour te rencontrer, c'est parce qu'ici nous pouvons nous parler en toute honnêteté, sans armes ni artifices.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_023<tab>So let us lay down our weapons for a day. Let us soak in these soothing waters, reminisce about times gone by, and see if we cannot put our petty differences behind us. Why, I've even brought a bottle of Hingan rice wine for the occasion...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_023<tab>Te rappelles-tu nos longues soirées passées dans les sources d'eau chaude du village, une coupe de saké à la main<var 1D /var>? Je te propose de restaurer ce rituel pour mettre de côté nos vieilles querelles.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_024<tab>Astonishing! Incredible! Has the dim one lost his wits? Does he believe that a few flowery words are enough to pull the wool over the crow's keen eyes while he steals away with the scroll? The audience gasps at the sheer audacity!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_024<tab>Hé hé hé... Tu crois vraiment que je suis naïf à ce point<var 1D /var>? Je sais très bien que tu es venu pour m'arracher le parchemin d'invocation<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_025<tab>Believe me or do not, the choice is yours. But this I swear: I have no interest in seeing the two halves of that accursed scroll reunited.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_025<tab>Détrompe-toi, je n'en ai pas la moindre intention. Comme tu le sais, il existe un autre parchemin, qui se trouve en lieu sûr dans notre village.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_026<tab>On the contrary, with one half safely sealed away in our village, and the other in the hands of the realm's most elusive ninja, the forbidden mudra will never be wielded again─and I would not have it any other way.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_026<tab>Tant que tu gardes ton parchemin, il y a peu de chance que les deux soient réunis et que la technique interdite soit utilisée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_027<tab>Furthermore, I have recently found enlightenment of a sort. At long last, I have realized that your skill with ninjutsu far exceeds my own─even had I once desired to steal the scroll back from you, I am now painfully aware that doing so is entirely beyond my abilities.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_027<tab>Tu sais, après toutes ces années, j'ai enfin réalisé que tu m'étais supérieur en tout point. Même si j'essayais de te prendre ce parchemin, je n'aurais aucune chance de réussir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_028<tab>Oho! Well, color me surprised! The boy's actually grown half a brain since last we met!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_028<tab>Qu'est-ce qui t'arrive, mon petit Oboro<var 1D /var>? C'est bien la première fois que tu fais preuve d'autant de lucidité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_029<tab>But aren't you being a bit naive, Oboro? After all, what's to stop me from simply returning to our village, effortlessly incapacitating our elders, and seizing the other half of the scroll for myself!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_029<tab>Mais dis-moi, ça ne t'est pas venu à l'idée que je pourrais essayer de m'emparer de l'autre parchemin pour faire usage de la technique d'invocation<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_030<tab>I know you too well, Karasu. It is not power that you crave, but freedom. You have worked too long, too hard to cast off the shackles of our village to risk losing it all over a single scroll.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_030<tab>Je te connais bien, et je sais que tout ce qui t'importe, c'est de préserver ta <var 1A 02 /var>liberté<var 1A 01 /var>. Et après ton petit numéro pour t'enfuir, je t'imagine mal retourner au village juste pour le parchemin.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_031<tab>The audience gasps! Why, I do believe that's the single most intelligent utterance that's ever escaped the dim one's lips!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_031<tab>Bingooo<var 1D /var>!!! Décidément, quelle perspicacité<var 1D /var>! Tu as vu juste, c'est le cadet de mes soucis. Enfin, pour le moment...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_032<tab>Very well, then. I'm feeling generous today, so I do believe I'll entertain your offers. Though for your sake, I do hope that the rice wine you've brought is a good vintage. I simply can't <var 1A 02 /var>abide<var 1A 01 /var> poor taste in beverages, you see...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_032<tab>Bon, puisque tu as l'air sincère, je veux bien te consacrer un peu de mon temps. Après tout, nous sommes de vieux amis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>You found a scroll! It's entitled <var 1A 02 /var>Mastering Doman Mahjong: A Primer for Prentices<var 1A 01 /var>. This doesn't appear to be the item you were looking for...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_040Vous avez trouvé un parchemin!
Malheureusement, il s'agissait d'une “méthode express pour gagner au mahjong domien”...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>You found a scroll! It's entitled <var 1A 02 /var>Big Ears and Bushy Tails: On the Breeding and Rearing of Rabbits<var 1A 01 /var>. This doesn't appear to be the item you were looking for...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_041Vous avez trouvé un parchemin!
Malheureusement, il s'agissait de “conseils pour bien élever un lapin de Mysidia”...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>You found a scroll! It's entitled <var 1A 02 /var>Oboro's Dullest and Most Dim-witted Moments, as Chronicled by Karasu Redbeak<var 1A 01 /var>. This doesn't appear to be the item you were looking for...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_042Vous avez trouvé un parchemin!
Malheureusement, il s'agissait d'un “recueil des exploits d'Oboro l'astre de la nuit”...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>You found a scroll! It's entitled <var 1A 02 /var>The Wandering Minstrel's Greatest Mysteries Revealed<var 1A 01 /var>. This doesn't appear to be the item you were looking for...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_043Vous avez trouvé un parchemin!
Malheureusement, il s'agissait d'un “journal intime du ménestrel errant”...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>The bookshelf appears to be quite sturdy. Perhaps you could use it as a foothold to reach the room above...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>Vous pouvez peut-être vous servir de cette étagère pour accéder à la mezzanine...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_050<tab>(-Oboro-)Ah, you return, friend! And with the scroll safely in your grasp, no doubt. Let me examine it, that I might ascertain its authenticity.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_050<tab>(-Oboro-)Mon plan a marché comme sur des roulettes<var 1D /var>! Montrez-moi le parchemin que vous avez récupéré.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_051<tab>(-Oboro-)Yes...yes, there can be no doubting it. This is indeed the forbidden mudra I sought! After all these years, finally have I outwitted that accursed crow!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_051<tab>(-Oboro-)Oui, c'est bien ça<var 1D /var>! C'est la technique d'invocation interdite<var 1D /var>! Cet idiot de Karasu n'y a vu que du feu, hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_052<tab>(-Oboro-)And yet, we must be wary. No doubt, Karasu has already realized that something is amiss. Let us reconvene at the storehouse before he can pick up our trail.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_052<tab>(-Oboro-)D'ailleurs, on ferait mieux de déguerpir avant qu'il découvre le pot aux roses<var 1D /var>! Retrouvons-nous à l'entrepôt du quai.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_060<tab>(-Oboro-)Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Do forgive me if I am a bit giddy. I still cannot quite believe that I outwitted Karasu for once. My plans have a habit of...firing back, as they say.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_060<tab>(-Oboro-)Ah, quel pied d'avoir réussi à berner Karasu<var 1D /var>! Le pauvre s'est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment laissé embobiner par mon jeu d'acteur de grande classe.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_061<tab>(-Oboro-)Why, you should have seen him! So convincing was my act, that by the time we were through he was stumbling and slurring his words so much that you'd think he'd downed a whole bathtub's worth of rice wine! Ahahahaha! Hahaha! ...Hah.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_061<tab>(-Oboro-)Sans compter qu'après quelques coupes de saké, il était com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment cuit, à point si j'ose dire<var 1D /var>! Finalement, il s'est fait avoir comme un bleu, hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_062<tab>(-Roguish Voice-)Gods' piss, lad, shut yer gob! Every cove and mort for malms can hear ye blabbin'...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_062<tab>(-Voix familière-)Tu m'as l'air bien en forme, Oboro<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qui te met en joie comme ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_063<tab>(-Oboro-)Ah, Captain Jacke! A pleasure as always. Do forgive me my outburst. I was merely celebrating with our mutual friend here my most remarkable triumph over the accursed Karasu!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_063<tab>(-Oboro-)Jacke<var 1D /var>! Figurez-vous que j'ai réussi à localiser Karasu, et à reprendre le parchemin qu'il avait dérobé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_064<tab>Ho there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Always a pleasure to see a dimber damber like yerself back in town. I trust yer stabbers haven't dulled none since last we met?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_064<tab>Oh, félicitations<var 1D /var>! Et je vois que <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> est avec toi, ça ne pouvait pas mieux tomber.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_065<tab>Anyway, between this reunion an' Oboro's hard-won victory, I reckon we've got cause to celebrate. What say we drag our dew beaters back to town and yaffle ourselves a bite at the Bismarck?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_065<tab>Je venais justement te proposer d'aller partager quelques bons petits plats dans le restaurant où j'ai mes habitudes. Du coup, ça sera l'occasion de fêter ça tous ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_066<tab>(-Oboro-)A splendid idea, my friend! Why, I would enjoy nothing more than to share this joyous moment with my boon companions. To the Bismarck, then─and the first round is on me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_066<tab>(-Oboro-)En voilà une bonne idée<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> et moi serions ravis de nous joindre à vous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_067<tab>That's the spirit! I'll send ahead for Underfoot and the Stray─the more, the benar after all! Aye, been too long since we had a right little rogue family reunion.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_067<tab>Parfait<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas, venez me rejoindre au Bismarck, à Limsa Lominsa. J'ai aussi invité V'kebbe et Perimu Haurimu, on ne va pas s'ennuyer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_068<tab>(-Oboro-)An upstanding fellow as ever, that Captain Jacke. Ah, but it is somewhat bittersweet, is it not? Now that my long-standing pursuit of Karasu has come to a close, I find myself in search of a new mission─a new purpose in my life, such as it were.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_068<tab>(-Oboro-)Avant de nous mettre en route, il y a quelque chose que j'aimerais vous demander. Maintenant que j'ai plus de raison de pourchasser Karasu, j'ai besoin d'un nouvel objectif.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_069<tab>I have no intention of returning to the cramped confines of my village...and yet, I am uncertain where my abilities might best avail the people of this realm. Pray tell, what sort of adventures have you been occupying yourself with of late?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_069<tab>(-Oboro-)Je vous le demande juste par curiosité, mais par quoi étiez-vous <var 08 E905 ((occupée)) ((occupé)) /var>, ces derniers temps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_Q2_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A2_000_001<tab>I traveled to the First.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A2_000_001<tab>J'ai voyagé dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A2_000_002<tab>I did battle with a great hunter.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A2_000_002<tab>J'ai combattu Andreia.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_070<tab>(-Oboro-)What's this you say? There exist worlds out there other than our own...!? If you are having a jest at Oboro's expense, old friend, let it be known I do not find it amusing!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_070<tab>(-Oboro-)Comment<var 1D /var>!? Vous avez combattu des monstres appelés “purgateurs”, pour sauver de la destruction un monde lointain<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_071<tab>(-Oboro-)But no...I can tell that you say this in earnest. Consider me intrigued, though forgive me if I am not in a hurry to seek out a means to travel there. No, I will bide my time here in Eorzea, and carefully ponder my future.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_071<tab>(-Oboro-)C'est très intéressant... Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je crois que cela dépasse mes compétences. Je vais devoir m'efforcer de trouver un défi plus à ma portée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_072<tab>(-Oboro-)At any rate, we mustn't keep Jacke and the others waiting, yes? I will make for the Bismarck as soon as I have attended to my affairs here. Why don't you travel on ahead?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_072<tab>(-Oboro-)Sur ce, mettons-nous en route pour Le Bismarck. J'ai quelques petites affaires à régler sur le chemin, donc je vous retrouverai sur place. À plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_100<tab>(-Oboro-)...And just like that, the scroll was mine again! And so I say, who is the “dim” one now, you damned crow!? Ahahaha!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_100<tab>(-Oboro-)Ouaaah, regardez-moi ce festin<var 1D /var>! Quand je pense qu'à l'heure qu'il est, Karasu doit être en train de s'arracher les cheveux... Quel pied, bon sang<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_101<tab>Aye, aye...ye've told the tale thrice over already. Is the mutton here yet? I'm right banded, I say...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_101<tab>J'ai rarement vu Oboro aussi euphorique. Il semble vraiment satisfait d'avoir enfin pris le dessus sur son ennemi de toujours...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_102<tab>(-Oboro-)And I will tell it over and again, my good captain! After all, it is no small feat to triumph over Karasu─quite possibly the most supremely skilled <var 1A 02 /var>shinobi<var 1A 01 /var> our village─nay, our world has ever known!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_102<tab>(-Oboro-)Oh que oui<var 1D /var>! Vous devez comprendre que cette fripouille a toujours été mon objectif, mon idéal, même... Et je l'ai finalement surpassé<var 1D /var>! C'est le plus beau jour de ma vie, ha ha ha<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_103<tab>Ye can say that again...wait, ye already have.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_103<tab>Tant mieux, alors...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_104<tab>M-My friends! Be on your guard! That Oboro is a fake!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_104<tab>Tu es fait, imposteur<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_105<tab>Wait, what in the...? There's two of 'em!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_105<tab>Hein, il y a <var 1A 02 /var>deux<var 1A 01 /var> Oboro<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_106<tab>(-Oboro-)What nonsense is this!? The sheer gall of this man! Clearly, if anyone here is a <var 1A 02 /var>fake<var 1A 01 /var>, it is the madman standing in the middle of this fine establishment stripped down to nothing but his undergarments!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_106<tab>(-Oboro-)Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Mais que dites-vous, enfin<var 1D /var>? C'est <var 1A 02 /var>moi<var 1A 01 /var>, le vrai Oboro<var 1D /var>! Et qui irait croire un détraqué qui se balade tout nu en ville<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_107<tab>I don't know, Jacke... They both look right convincin' to me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_107<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'on va faire<var 1D /var>!? Ils se ressemblent vrrraiment comme deux gouttes d'eau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_Q1_000_000<tab>Which is the true Oboro?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_Q1_000_000<tab>Quel Oboro est le vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A1_000_001<tab>The one in his underclothes.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A1_000_001<tab>Celui qui est tout nu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A1_000_002<tab>The one fully dressed.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_A1_000_002<tab>Celui qui est habillé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_108<tab>Aye, Jacke's glazes say the same. Only the real Oboro'd be daft enough to stumble into this place stripped down to his skivvies.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_108<tab>Tu as sûrement raison<var 1D /var>! Ce style d'entrée en scène inimitable, c'est Oboro tout craché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_109<tab>I wouldn't be so sure o' that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! No, ol' Jacke reckons that one's too dimber to be the real Oboro...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_109<tab>... Tu crois<var 1D /var>!? Pourtant, Oboro a toujours cet air contrarié... C'est l'autre le vrai, ça ne fait aucun doute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_110<tab>(-Oboro-)Oh, <var 1A 02 /var>fine<var 1A 01 /var> then. I tire of this drab old disguise, anyhow.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_110<tab>(-Oboro-)On dirait que la partie de cache-cache est terminée, hé hé...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_111<tab>Karasu! Does your villainy know no bounds!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_111<tab>Karasu<var 1D /var>! Tu t'es servi de moi pour obtenir l'autre parchemin, c'est ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_112<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Villainy<var 1A 01 /var>? You wound me, Oboro! Why, after I learned the art of illusion from that overstuffed Lord What's-his-name, I simply thought I would put it to use and have a little fun. We did have fun, didn't we?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_112<tab>Comment s'appelait le chef du clan Kagekakushi, déjà... Hanzo, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? J'ai bien aimé sa technique de transformation, et j'attendais l'occasion de m'en servir à bon escient.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_113<tab>I must say, Oboro, your friends are far more entertaining than you are. I daresay you could learn a thing or two from them. But ah well, I suppose all good things must come to an end. Till we meet again...farewell!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_KARASU_000_113<tab>J'ai pu voir ce que ça faisait d'être dans la peau de ce bon vieux Oboro, et je me suis amusé comme jamais<var 1D /var>!!! Sur ce, à la revoyure mes mignooons<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_114<tab>...Off like a crow in the night.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_114<tab>Grrr... Comme toujours, il est bien rapide pour détaler.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_115<tab>Don't be too hard on yerself, boy. He had us all rooked.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_115<tab>Oui, et il s'est bien payé ta tête, pour ne pas changer...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_116<tab>Anyhow, now that all's bob, I reckon it's about time we took our dew beaters to the Sisters. You come along too, Oboro. I'll get ye somethin' to...cover yerself up a bit.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_116<tab>Mais peu importe, pour le moment, il faut vite t'habiller<var 1D /var>! Allons à la guilde pour te trouver quelques vêtements, puis tu nous raconteras comment tu en es arrivé là.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_120<tab>What do ye say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I reckon the lad's lookin' sharper than ever.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_120<tab>Ces vêtements lui vont à ravir<var 1D /var>! Voilà maintenant Oboro à la pointe de la mode limséenne, hé hé.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_121<tab>Say what ye will, but Jacke's fashion sense is certainly one of a kind.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_PERIMUHAURIMU_000_121<tab>Je me suis toujours dit que le chef avait des goûts un peu... bizarres.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_122<tab>That's one o' Jacke's favorite outfits. The poor colt...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_122<tab>Pauvre Oboro, être obligé de porter les vêtements prrrivés de Jacke...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_130<tab>Captain Jacke was kind enough to lend me some garb from his personal wardrobe. They are rather, er, how might I describe it...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_130<tab>Ces vêtements qui m'ont gentiment été prêtés par Jacke... comment dire...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_131<tab>Sophisticated! Stylish! Dashing and delightful!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_131<tab>Ils en jettent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_132<tab>Did I tell ye or did I tell ye!? Ol' Jacke's got ye lookin' benar than ever before! Every rum doxy in Limsa won't be able to take 'er glazes off ye!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_132<tab>Mais oui<var 1D /var>! Je ne savais pas que tu étais au courant des dernières tendances, Oboro. À Limsa Lominsa, on ne fait pas plus branché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_133<tab>Nor can I...an' not in a good way.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_VKEBBE_000_133<tab>Euh... Vous êtes sûrrr, Chef<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_134<tab>In any event, I owe you all─especially you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─an apology for this most unfortunate turn of events.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_134<tab>Bon, je vais vous raconter comment se sont déroulés les événements. Tout a commencé lorsque j'échangeais des coupes de saké avec Karasu, pour le retenir dans le bain le plus longtemps possible...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_135<tab>I had thought my plan flawless, but unfortunately I had neglected to account for one thing: the possibility that Karasu's tolerance for Hingan rice wine might be considerably higher than my own.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_135<tab>Après ça, j'ai comme un trou noir. Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'est que je me suis réveillé sur le lit à l'intérieur de la masure de l'ermite, dans le plus simple appareil. J'ai sûrement présumé de ma résistance à la boisson...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_136<tab>I cannot say for sure precisely what happened. All I know is that one moment we were engaged in a most delightful conversation, and the next I was lying on a cot in the hovel with nothing but my undergarments on me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_136<tab>Pendant ce temps, Karasu a pris mon apparence grâce à la technique de Hanzo, il a revêtu ma tenue et il est tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment allé recevoir le parchemin de la part de <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_137<tab>Suspecting that something was amiss, I dashed back to the dock storehouse as quick as my legs could carry me, only to find neither you nor Karasu present...and my personal wardrobe completely empty, to boot.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_137<tab>Lorsque j'ai repris mes esprits, je me suis hâté à l'entrepôt du quai, mais Karasu avait pris le soin de cacher le moindre vêtement, sans que Yomei ne se doute de rien... J'ai donc été obligé de rallier Limsa Lominsa tout nu.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_138<tab>Hah! A dimber damber as always, that one. Gettin' you some new duds was one thing, but cloyin' that scroll back from Karasu is goin' to be a whole 'nother matter.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_138<tab>Tu es bien forcé de reconnaître qu'une fois de plus, il a été plus malin que toi. Il t'a tourné en ridicule, et le parchemin est toujours en sa possession...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_139<tab>Damn it all! But mark my words─that scoundrel will not get away with his villainy this time. No, I must return to the storehouse at once and draw up a plan to retrieve what is rightfully mine!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_OBORO_000_139<tab>Grrr, alors que je pensais enfin en avoir fini, me voilà à nouveau obligé de lui courir après... Cette vieille corneille ne perd rien pour attendre, je vais lui montrer, cette fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_140<tab>Ahahaha! For all the lad's whingin', damned if he didn't actually seem <var 1A 02 /var>pleased<var 1A 01 /var> with this turn of events.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_140<tab>Hé hé hé... Décidément, ces deux-là sont in<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>bles. Je commence à me demander s'ils ne se complaisent pas dans leur petite rivalité...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_141<tab>Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Reckon ye've got adventures ye'd best be gettin' back to, eh? Just promise me ye'll drop in on Oboro and lend him your daddles from time to time. He's a good lad, but he's got a habit of trippin' over his own two dew beaters, if ye whiddle me.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_141<tab>Quant à toi, même si je sais que tu es toujours très <var 08 E905 ((occupée)) ((occupé)) /var>, j'espère que tu garderas un petit œil sur Oboro pour l'aider quand il en aura besoin.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_142<tab>...Heh. Now ye've got me soundin' like the boy's father. Anyhow, don't be a stranger here at the Sisters, either. Gods only know we can always use a dimber damber like yerself.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC010_03219_JACKE_000_142<tab>D'ailleurs, heureusement qu'il est là avec ses histoires farfelues. Sans lui, on ne te verrait jamais à la guilde des surineurs<var 1D /var>! Pense aussi à passer nous dire bonjour de temps en temps, d'accord<var 1D /var>?
